content: **crocheted top in drops safran the piece is worked top down with lace pattern sizes s - xxxl ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern e-347 yarn group a ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl **yarn** drops safran from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 250-250-300-300-350-350 g colour 70 sweet orchid **crochet hook** drops crochet hook size 3 mm **crochet gauge** 24 treble crochets in width and 13 row in height = 10 x 10 cm hook size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger hook size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller hook size
